mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RPT WHERE DIVCODE != 'R'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RPT WHERE DIVCODE = 'R'

/* selectList 상세 게시글 조회 */ SELECT 'L' AS DIVCODE , LB.LOCAL_BOARD_NO , LB.LB_WRITER , LB.LOCAL_BOARD_TITLE , LB.LOCAL_BOARD_CONTENT , LB.CREATE_DATE , LB.STATUS , COUNT(RPT.RPT_NO) AS RPT_CNT FROM LOCAL_BOARD LB , RPT RPT WHERE LB.LOCAL_BOARD_NO = RPT.WRITE_NO AND RPT.DIVCODE = 'L' GROUP BY LB.LOCAL_BOARD_NO, LB.LB_WRITER, LB.LOCAL_BOARD_TITLE , LB.LOCAL_BOARD_CONTENT, LB.CREATE_DATE , LB.STATUS UNION ALL SELECT 'M' AS DIVCODE , MT.MATE_NO AS LOCAL_BOARD_NO , MT.MATE_WRITER AS LB_WRITER , MT.MATE_TITLE AS LOCAL_BOARD_TITLE , MT.MATE_CONTENT AS LOCAL_BOARD_CONTENT , MT.CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE , MT.STATUS , COUNT(RPT.RPT_NO) AS RPT_CNT FROM MATE MT , RPT RPT WHERE RPT.WRITE_NO = MT.MATE_NO AND RPT.DIVCODE = 'M' GROUP BY MT.MATE_NO , MT.MATE_WRITER, MT.MATE_TITLE , MT.MATE_CONTENT, MT.CREATE_DATE , MT.STATUS

SELECT LOCAL_BOARD_NO , LOCAL_CODE , LB_WRITER , LOCAL_BOARD_CONTENT , DIVCODE , LOCAL_BOARD_TITLE , CREATE_DATE FROM (SELECT LOCAL_BOARD_NO , LOCAL_CODE , LB_WRITER , LOCAL_BOARD_CONTENT , 'L' AS DIVCODE , LOCAL_BOARD_TITLE , CREATE_DATE FROM LOCAL_BOARD WHERE LOCAL_BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} UNION ALL SELECT MATE_NO AS LOCAL_BOARD_NO , LOCAL_CODE AS LOCAL_CODE , MATE_WRITER AS LB_WRITER , MATE_CONTENT AS LOCAL_BOARD_CONTENT , 'M' AS DIVCODE , MATE_TITLE AS LOCAL_BOARD_TITLE , CREATE_DATE FROM MATE WHERE MATE_NO = #{boardNo} )DETAIL WHERE DETAIL.DIVCODE = #{divCode}

SELECT 'R' AS DIVCODE , RE.REPLY_NO , RE.REPLY_WRITER , RE.REPLY_CONTENT , RE.CREATE_DATE , RE.STATUS , RE.REPLY_LEVEL , COUNT(RPT.RPT_NO) AS RPT_CNT FROM REPLY RE , RPT RPT WHERE RE.REPLY_NO = RPT.WRITE_NO AND RPT.DIVCODE = 'R' GROUP BY RE.REPLY_NO, RE.REPLY_WRITER, RE.REPLY_CONTENT , RE.CREATE_DATE, RE.STATUS , RE.REPLY_LEVEL
SELECT RPT_NO , WRITE_NO , DIVCODE , USER_ID , RPT_DATE , RPT_CONTENT FROM RPT WHERE RPT.DIVCODE = #{divCode} AND WRITE_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY RPT_NO
